description:
In the year 2015, the Angels, huge, tremendously powerful, alien war machines, appear in Tokyo for the second time. The only hope for mankind`s survival lies in the Evangelion, a humanoid fighting machine developed by http://anidb.net/ch5009 [NERV], a special United Nations agency. Capable of withstanding anything the Angels can dish out, the Evangelions` one drawback lies in the limited number of people able to pilot them. Only a handful of teenagers, all born fourteen years ago, nine months after the Angels first appeared, are able to interface with an Evangelion.
One such teenager is http://anidb.net/ch309 [Ikari Shinji], whose father heads the NERV team that developed and maintains the Evangelions. Thrust into a maelstrom of battles and events that he does not understand, Shinji is forced to plumb the depths of his own inner resources for the courage and strength to not only fight, but to survive, or risk losing everything.
Note: The 2003 Renewal of Evangelion is the final remastered version. It includes:

* http://anidb.net/a22 [The original TV series], episodes 1-20
* The Director`s Cut of episodes 21-24 of the original TV series
* http://anidb.net/a326 [Death(True)^2], released on the ninth disc with the label of Revival of Evangelion
* http://anidb.net/a202 [The End of Evangelion], released on the tenth disc, with the label Evangelion – The Feature Film

REGULAR.description:
In the year 2015, an Angel returns to attack Tokyo-3. Misato Katsuragi transports Shinji to the NERV base overseen by his estranged father, Gendo.
Source: netflix

After piloting the Eva Until 01, Shinji wakes up in the hospital with no memory of the battle. Feeling sorry for him, Misato lets him move in with her.
Source: netflix

Word gets around school that Shinji is the Eva pilot; his classmate Toji resents him for it. An Angel appears and Shinji must pilot in combat again.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Telefon, który nigdy nie dzwoni / Przeniesienie

REGULAR.description:
Stressed out following his last battle. Shinji runs away from home and meets Kunsuke. After NERV brings him back in, Misato offers him a choice.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Deszcz, ucieczka i jej następstwa / Dylemat jeża

REGULAR.description:
Unit 00`s pilot Rei Ayanami appears to have recovered, but she has no friends, no records of her past, and no interest in getting to know Shinji.
Source: netflix

titles.title: レイ, 心の向こうに

REGULAR.description:
As the Fifth Angel drills toward NERV, Misato leads Operation Yashima: All of Japan`s power will be diverted to take out Ramiel with a positron rifle.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Decydujące starcie w Tokio-3 / Rei II

REGULAR.description:
Ritsuko tells Shinji about the classified tru cause of the Second Impact. Then she and Misato attend the field test for an Eva competitor mecha.
Source: netflix

Shinji and his friends accompany Misato to meet Eva Unit 02 and its pilot Asuka at sea. Misato`s old friend Ryoji Kaji is aboard with his own agenda.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Asuka przybywa do Japonii / Asuka atakuje!

REGULAR.description:
Asuka and Shinji face another Angel but it gets the upper hand. They now have six days to learn synchronized moves to destroy it completely.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Both of You, Dance Like You Want to Win!
Juste un instant, les cœurs à l`unisson
Wasze serca biją jak jedno / Tańczcie, jakby od tego zależało zwycięstwo
Wer nicht tanzt, der nicht gewinnt
瞬間, 心, 重ねて

REGULAR.description:
NERV learns of an Angel in dormant embryonic form inside a volacno. Using equipment designed for magma, Asuka is sent to retrieve it with Unit 02.
Source: netflix

Tokyo-3 loses power just as another Angel is detected. The Eva pilots must enter the base from the surface while NERV preps the Units manually.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Der Tag, als Tokio-3 still stand
Seishi Shita Yami no Naka de
W ciemnościach / Dzień, w którym Tokio-3 zamarło

REGULAR.description:
With Gendo and Tuyutsuki in Antarctica, a newly promoted Misato is in charge when a new Angel appears above the Earth, aiming to bomb Tokyo-3.
Source: netflix

titles.title: A ceną cudu jest... / Powiedziała: Nie pozwól, by inni cierpieli z powodu twojej nienawiści
She Said: "Don`t Make Others Suffer for Your Personal Hatred."

REGULAR.description:
An Angel infiltrates NERV, quickly taking over the MAGI supercomputer. Ritsuko proposes writing a program to forcibly evolve Ireri to its extinction.
Source: netflix

As Seele reviews NERV and Gendo`s action with the Third through Eleventh Angels, Ritsuko conducts a test in which the Eva pilots switch Units.
Source: netflix

For the first time in years, Shinji meets his father at his mother`s grave. Ritsuko, Misato and Ryoji attend a wedding and Asuka goes on a date.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Kłamstwo i cisza / Te kobiety marzyły o dotyku obcych warg i to przyciągało ich pocałunki
Those Women Longed for the Touch of Others` Lips, and Thus Invited Their Kisses.

REGULAR.description:
While in battle, Shinji and Unit 01 are engulfed in the spreading shadow of an Angel. As NERV fears them both lost, Shinji has a strange experience.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Śmiertelna choroba, a potem... / Oderwanie od piersi
死に至る病, そして

REGULAR.description:
NERV-02 in Nevada vanishes, along with the Eva Unit 04. With Unit 03 on the way, Gendo orders Ritsuko to assign a pilot to it.
Source: netflix

Unit 03 arrives from the United States, but Shinji still doesn`t know who its pilot is. During testing, NERV learns Unit 03 is possessed by an Angel.
Source: netflix

Distraught after the battle, Shinji vows to never pilot an Eva again and quits NERV once more. Just as he`s about to leave, another Angel attacks.
Source: netflix

After achieving an unheard of synchronization rate. Shinji merges with Unit 01. While he has an out of body experience, NERV works to salvage him.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Forma do Coração Espelho do Mundo
Forme du cœur, miroir des gens
Kokoro no Katachi, Hito no Katachi
Kształt serca, kształt człowieka / Wspomnienia 2: Faza oralna
心のかたち 人のかたち

REGULAR.description:
Seele kidnaps Fuyutsuki and interrogates him about NERV and Gendo`s true intentions, revealing events from the past. Ryoji goes missing.
Source: netflix

titles.title: He Was Aware that He Was Still a Child.
Narodziny NERVu / Zdawał sobie sprawę, że jest tylko dzieckiem

REGULAR.description:
Asuka`s synchronization ratio continues to drop, undermining her self-confidence. Determined to show her worth, she ignores orders during battle.
Source: netflix

titles.title: せめて, 人間らしく

REGULAR.description:
Despite her struggles, Asuka is ordered to assist Rei in battle against Armisael. When she fails, Rei makes a desperate move in order to save Shinji.
Source: netflix

Kaworu Nagisa, the Fifth Child, comes to NERV to pilot Unit 02 in Asuka`s place. He`s friendly to Shinji, but he`s shrouded in mystery.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Anfang und Ende - Der Letzte Botschafter
Ostatni Posłaniec / Początek i koniec, albo "Pukając do Nieba Bram"
The Beginning and the End, or "Knockin` on the Heaven`s Door"

REGULAR.description:
The Human Instrumentality Project begins, and the souls of humanity merge. The Eva pilots confront the nature of their existence as reality dissolves.
Source: netflix

The Human Instrumentality Project continues. Shinji must decide whether to accept a world alone, or embrace connections with others.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Bestia, która krzyknęła "JA" w samym sercu świata / Trzymaj się
La Bête qui criait « Moi » au centre du monde
Sekai no Chuushin de Ai o Sakenda Kemono
世界の中心でアイを叫んだけもの
Revival of Evangelion Extras Disc - Story Board Feature

SPECIAL.description: This is a fictional comedy radio drama recorded by the original cast of Evangelion.

titles.title: フルサイズOP 「残酷な天使のテーゼ」
フルサイズED 「Fly Me to the Moon」
Neon Genesis Evangelion BD/DVD Remaster Announcement Trailer

titles.title: อีวานเกเลี่ยน: มหาสงครามวันพิพากษา
新世紀エヴァンゲリオン
O Evangelho de uma Nova Gênesis
